name: Chaat Tikki
description: Made with mashed potatoes, chickpeas, spices, and herbs, shaped into patties and fried until crispy.

name: Dabeli
description: Made with spiced potato filling, tamarind chutney, pomegranate, and peanuts, all sandwiched in a soft pav (bread roll).

name: Aloo Tikki
description: Made with mashed potatoes, peas, and spices like cumin, coriander, and garam masala, shaped into patties and fried until golden and crispy.

name: Pan Fried Paneer
description: Made with paneer (Indian cottage cheese), marinated in spices like turmeric, chili powder, and garam masala, then pan-fried until golden and crispy.

name: Chakli
description: Made with rice flour, chickpea flour, and a blend of spices like cumin and sesame seeds, then deep-fried into crispy, spiral-shaped snacks.
